newsitem.title: USA: SunAmerica fund hires high-yield manager.
newsitem.headline: SunAmerica fund hires high-yield manager.

text.p: SunAmerica Asset Management Corp said it hired John Risner as senior portfolio manager for its fixed income investment team.
Risner will focus on high-yield investments for both mutual funds and annuities.
Risner joins SunAmerica from Value Line Asset Management, where he was senior portfolio manager of the Value Line Aggressive Income Trust and Value Line Convertible funds.
SunAmerica Asset Management is the mutual fund management and investment advisory unit of SunAmerica Inc.
